SurfsUp

This mobile app application was built using React Native and a third party API. This app is meant to connect the local surf community and iform users about the wave and weather conditions at their favorite beaches.
Technology used:React Native

DiveLog

This application allows divers to log their dives. Used react-router to navigate between pages and learned how to implemented Redux.
Technology uses:React

MotherBearMeals

Under the construction! MotherBearMeals is a non-profit company providing access to nutricious food for perinatal families.

Dongle

Based off a project prompt, this WordPress inspired application allows signed-in users to create and manage 'Pages' and 'Posts'. Any non-signed in user can view all blog posts by all the users within the community! This project was a collaborative effort with 2 other fellow GA students, using Git and GitHub for version control and, project management. This single application was built using HTML, CSS, Jquery and Handlebars for the front-end. Our non-relational database uses MongoDB, as well as ExpressJS for an API with Node.js and Mongoose.

Check it out
